Content.Text:
<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have a message for you today,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Alice ordered me to hide some music.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>That was exhausting to do...

<FACE_KORO1><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you find it, collect it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>Good luck on your search!

<POS_RIGHT>
It must be hidden in somebody's house!
Search for it!
